name: Casper Wallet
description: Securely manage your CSPR tokens and interact with dapps with the self-custody wallet for the Casper blockchain.
author: MAKE LLC

scripts.build:manifest:v2:firefox: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production BROWSER=firefox HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) node utils/build.js
scripts.build:manifest:v2:safari: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production BROWSER=safari HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) node utils/build.js
scripts.build:manifest:v3:chrome: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production BROWSER=chrome HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) node utils/build.js
scripts.dev:build:manifest:v2:firefox: NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development BROWSER=firefox HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) node utils/build.js
scripts.dev:build:manifest:v2:safari: NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development BROWSER=safari HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) node utils/build.js
scripts.dev:build:manifest:v3:chrome: NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development BROWSER=chrome HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) node utils/build.js
scripts.dev:chrome: npm run dev:build:chrome && NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development BROWSER=chrome HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) PORT=3001 node utils/webserver.js
scripts.start:chrome: concurrently -k -n start,redux "npm run dev:chrome" "npm run devtools:redux -- --port=8000"
scripts.dev:firefox: npm run dev:build:firefox && NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development BROWSER=firefox HASH=$(git rev-parse HEAD) PORT=3002 node utils/webserver.js
scripts.start:firefox: concurrently -k -n start,redux "npm run dev:firefox" "npm run devtools:redux -- --port=8001"
scripts.start:safari: npm run dev:build:manifest:v2:safari && ./convert-web-extension.sh && NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=development BROWSER=safari PORT=3003 node utils/webserver.js
scripts.ci-check: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run tsc && npm run test
scripts.e2e:chrome:headless:onboarding: TEST_ENV=true npm run build:chrome && PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSER=chromium npx playwright test e2e-tests/onboarding-flow --project chromium
scripts.e2e:chrome:ui:onboarding: TEST_ENV=true npm run build:chrome && PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSER=chromium npx playwright test e2e-tests/onboarding-flow --ui --project chromium
scripts.e2e:chrome:headless:popup: TEST_ENV=true MOCK_STATE=true npm run build:chrome && PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSER=chromium npx playwright test e2e-tests/popup --project chromium
scripts.e2e:chrome:ui:popup: TEST_ENV=true MOCK_STATE=true npm run build:chrome && PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSER=chromium npx playwright test e2e-tests/popup --ui --project chromium
